name: Clowns-AngelBob-Nuclear
title: MadClown01's AngelBob Nuclear
author: MadClown01,Pezzawinkle
description: Adds a thermonuclear bomb and thorium & plutonium fuel cycles. Gives end-game Bob's enemies something to fear. Adds an optional uranium enrichment chain as a far more intricate replacement to the Koravex Enrichment Process.
